snippet: Sage Karam, 20, a rookie in IndyCar racing’s top series with an audacious racing style and personality to match, represents a new generation of driver.
abstract: Profile of Sage Karam, 20-year-old IndyCar rookie, before his upcoming appearance in ABC Supply 500 at Pocono Raceway.
lead_paragraph: Sage Karam, 20, a rookie in IndyCar racing’s top series with an audacious racing style and personality to match, represents a new generation of driver.

headline.main: The New Face of IndyCar Racing Has an Audacious Style
headline.print_headline: The New Face of IndyCar Racing Is Not Afraid to Bump Fenders or Heads
